items.title: Oracle Database 12c: Partitioning Improvements with Tom Kyte
items.description:
Tom Kyte introduces the new partitioning improvements in Oracle Database 12c, followed by a demo of global index maintenance. For more information:

  • Asynchronous Global Index Maintenance for Dropping and Truncating Partitions
  • Changes for Very Large Databases and Partitioning in Oracle Database 12c Release 1
  • ALTER INDEX COALESCE Clause
  • DBMS_PART.CLEANUP_GIDX Procedure

items.title: Oracle Database 12c: Improved Defaults
items.description:
Tom Kyte and Chuck Murray describe several improvements to default behavior in Oracle Database 12c: defaults based on sequences, default on NULL, Identity type columns, and metadata-only defaults. For more information:

  • CREATE TABLE" statement in Oracle® Database SQL Language Reference
  • ALTER TABLE" statement in Oracle® Database SQL Language Reference
  • Identity Columns" in Oracle® Database Migration Guide

items.title: Oracle Database 12c demos: In-Memory Column Store Architecture Overview
items.description: The demonstration provides an overview of the architecture of the In-Memory Column Store feature introduced in Oracle Database 12c Release 1 patchset 1.

items.title: Oracle Database 12c: Better PL/SQL From SQL
items.description:
Overview and demonstration of using the plsql_declarations clause to embed a PL/SQL function in a SQL SELECT statement.

  • "plsql_declarations" in Oracle® Database SQL Language Reference

items.title: Oracle Database 12c: Creating a Unified Audit Policy
items.description:
Overview and demo of using a unified audit policy to audit database behaviors, database components, and database users. 

  • Monitoring Database Activity with Auditing" in Oracle Database Security Guide
  • Auditing Database Activity" in Oracle Database 2 Day + Security Guide
  • Keeping Your Oracle Database Secure" in Oracle Database Security Guide

items.title: Oracle Database 12c: Easy Top N and Pagination Queries
items.description:
Pagination queries using the row limiting clause to fetch N rows or a percentage of rows in a table. For more information, see

  • Limiting SQL Rows
  • row_limiting_clause

items.title: Oracle Database 12c:Enhanced Optimizer Statistics with Tom Kyte
items.description:
Tom Kyte discusses enhanced optimizer statistics followed by a demo of on-load statistics gathering in Oracle Database 12c.

  • Online Statistics Gathering for Bulk Loads
  • Histograms
  • CREATE TABLE ... AS SELECT
  • CREATE TABLE

items.title: Oracle Database 12c: Adaptive Execution Plans with Tom Kyte
items.description:
Tom Kyte introduces adaptive execution plans followed by a demo.

  • Adaptive Plans" in SQL Tuning Guide
  • Controlling Adaptive Optimization
  • Generating and Displaying SQL Execution Plans
  • Keeping Your Database Secure

items.title: Oracle Database 12c: Introduction to a Multitenant Environment with Tom Kyte
items.description:
Tom Kyte introduces Oracle Multitenant in Oracle Database 12c followed by a demo showing: multitenant architecture, moving a pluggable database (PDB) from one multitenant container database (CDB) to another, cloning a PDB, and creating a new PDB. For more information:

  • Multitenant Architecture" in Oracle® Database Concepts
  • Managing a Multitenant Environment" in Oracle® Database Administrator's Guide
  • About Common Users and Local Users" in Oracle® Database Security Guide

items.title: Oracle Database 12c: Creating a Role Using Oracle Enterprise Manager Database Express
items.description: Demo of how to create a role using EM Express.

items.title: Oracle Database 12c: Moving Online Data Files
items.description: This video shows the steps for moving an online data file in Oracle Database 12c.

items.title: Oracle Database 12c: Recovering a Pluggable Database
items.description: This video explains how to recover a pluggable database.

items.title: Oracle Secure Backup 10.4: Configuring the Administrative Domain with Enterprise Manager
items.description: How to configure and Oracle Secure Backup 10.4 administrative domain using Oracle Enterprise Manager 11g Database Control.
